description:
Game: Anime Reborn

Resolution: 1920x1080 (You Might Need To Set The Regions/Click Locations Again If They Don't Work)

Mode: First Story Act 1 (Probably Works On Later Acts)

Units: Genos Slot 1, Bulma Slot 2, Neji Slot 3

Start Macro Key: F3

Stop Macro Key: F4

(You Can Change These)

Position: Move To The Corner Of The Path And Look Straight Down
